item.title: More Thoughts on Go
item.description:
A ‘meh’ language, with a stellar platform

I keep finding myself toying with Go, thinking of throwing together projects with it. It’s hard to really appreciate it until you take it’s entire framework together as a full set. In much the same way, I appreciate and enjoy coding in Java. Not so much for Java’s language features (I’d hardly call Java-the-language cutting edge), but more for the entire platform and community around it.
